member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContinuationHelper
member.summary: Static class that consumes the response from the Authentication flow and continues token acquisition. This class should be called in ApplicationDelegate whenever app loads/reloads.
